title: Let Me Tell It: The Pain
description: “Let Me tell The Pain” is the first book in a three part series in which the author experiences the traumatic sting of divorce. The forward was written by Dr. Kaston Anderson-Carpenter, an Associate Psychology professor at Michigan State University. He calls the book a "Proclamation of victory in the midst of the storm!" This book gives the reader an inside view of how devastating the death of a relationship can be. The reader will laugh, cry, scream, and experience a host of other emotions as they take this journey with the author. Grab your Kleenex and enjoy yet another, page-turner from your favorite author.
author: Karen D. Lomax
